text:
Happy 30th Anniversary to one of my fav albums:

<https://open.spotify.com/album/3GH4IiI6jQAIvnHVdb5FB6?si=QoxKEcmdS4yBVrAjZPtDKA>

Living proof that the more gear you have, the better musician you are. Or at least that’s what I tell my wife.
how did i never listen to all of this? omg that’s a lot of sounds!
i needed this as a complement to my Wire CDs
